translation.en: There's really nothing...
translation.es: CENTRO DE LA NACIÓN NAVAJO No pasa nada en Chinle.

translation.en: goin' on in Chinle.
There's no clubs.
No dance, no movie theater...
translation.es: No hay discotecas, no hay cines...

translation.en: There's really no outlet for the kids or the adults.
translation.es: Los chicos y los adultos no tienen cómo relajarse.

translation.en: We're on the rez.
It's like, uh... alcohol and the, uh...
bad side of life... home environment,
violence, maybe...
havin', uh... alcoholic parents and stuff.
Chinle basketball is kind of, like, uh...
an addiction to some people.
translation.es: es como una adicción para algunos.

translation.en: It brings a little bit of happiness for them.
translation.es: Les da un poco de felicidad.

translation.en: Our student athletes are kind of a... a modern- day warrior.
translation.es: Nuestros estudiantes atletas son los guerreros modernos.

translation.en: And in our culture,
a warrior is defined as somebody who represents their people...
translation.es: un guerrero es alguien que representa a su gente...

translation.en: not just a fighter.
Fired and locked down.
I love it.
This team actually could make history for Chinle.
translation.es: Este equipo podría hacer historia para Chinle.

translation.en: It could win Chinle's first state championship, you know.
translation.es: Podría ganar el primer campeonato estatal.

translation.en: We always dream big.
Good job! Good job!
If we could raise a state title banner,
the pride it would bring to our community... It... It would mean everything.
translation.es: el orgullo que sentiría la comunidad sería indescriptible.

translation.en: A state title is a chance for our kids to get noticed
translation.es: Un título estatal permite que a los chicos los conozcan

translation.en: outside the reservation,
and maybe even give them a shot at a better life.
translation.es: Así tal vez puedan lograr una vida mejor.

translation.en: What a night. What a night at Chinle.
We want them to make history in Chinle.
translation.es: Queremos que hagan historia en Chinle.

translation.en: They have that potential.
It's... it's right there for them.
And this year, I believe we can finally do it.
translation.es: Y este año, creo que lo lograremos.

translation.en: Chinle is a town of about 4,500 people.
translation.es: Chinle es un pueblo de 4500 personas.

translation.en: It's right in the heart of the Navajo Nation.
translation.es: Está en el corazón de la Nación Navajo.

translation.en: The Nation is over 27,000 square miles,
translation.es: La nación tiene más de 70 000 kilómetros cuadrados

translation.en: and it extends into three different states,
Arizona, Utah and New Mexico.
In northeastern Arizona, we don't have a Triple- A farm team.
translation.es: En el noreste de Arizona, no hay un equipo triple A de ligas menores.

translation.en: We don't have a semi- pro football or baseball team.
translation.es: No tenemos un equipo semiprofesional de fútbol o béisbol.

translation.en: We have a high school basketball team.
translation.es: Tenemos un equipo de básquetbol de secundaria.

translation.en: - Hello. - Hey, Sophie, Shaun here.
- Shaun. Good morning. - Good morning.
Five years ago, when I was first hired as athletic director,
translation.es: Hace cinco años, cuando me contrataron como director de deportes,

translation.en: our basketball team won four games,
translation.es: el equipo de básquetbol ganó cuatro juegos,

translation.en: and that's just not gonna cut it around here.
translation.es: pero eso no va a ser suficiente.

translation.en: - Okay. Thanks, Sophie. - Bye.
The way I view this whole department,
translation.es: La forma en que veo todo...

translation.en: is I want the best for my kids.
translation.es: ...es que quiero lo mejor para mis chicos.

translation.en: I call all these kids my kids.
You know, I want the best coach available for my kids.
translation.es: Quiero al mejor entrenador para mis chicos.

translation.en: We decided we wanted Coach Mendoza,
and we were able to land him two years ago.
translation.es: y lo conseguimos hace dos años.

translation.en: He's coached for over 40 years.
He's been to eight final fours.
translation.es: Llegó a los cuatro finales ocho veces.

translation.en: He's been to four state title games,
and he's even won the Arizona state championships.
translation.es: e incluso ganó el campeonato estatal de Arizona.

translation.en: He's a legend on the rez.
translation.es: Es una leyenda en la reserva.

translation.en: And, oh, yeah, name me one other high school coach in America
translation.es: Nombra a cualquier otro entrenador de secundaria del país

translation.en: that has had Kareem Abdul- Jabbar as an assistant coach.
translation.es: que haya tenido a Kareem Abdul-Jabbar como asistente.

translation.en: I'll see you.
He knows the struggles we deal with,
he knows what it takes to take a team like ours
translation.es: sabe lo que hace falta para que nuestro equipo avance

translation.en: deep into the tournament bracket.
Got to keep the dogs out.
As a head coach, my whole purpose is to win a state championship.
translation.es: Como entrenador, mi objetivo es ganar un campeonato estatal.

translation.en: I knew that Chinle's always had talent.
With my background, I always believed that there's always a first time.
translation.es: Con mi experiencia, sé que siempre hay una primera vez.

translation.en: And so, when I first came up here two years back,
I said, Hey, we wanna win a state championship.
translation.es: dije: Queremos ganar un campeonato estatal.

translation.en: Right away, I started telling the kids that, you know, that's our goal.
translation.es: Enseguida les dije a los chicos que ese era el objetivo.

translation.en: Saying, You gotta believe, you gotta believe.
I think with the kids, a lot of it is psychological.
translation.es: Con los chicos, lo importante es lo psicológico.

translation.en: So we've been talking about a lot of things
translation.es: Hemos estado hablando de muchas cosas

translation.en: and trying to build up to this point,
translation.es: para poder llegar a este lugar.

translation.en: you know, trying to get them to relax
to where they... they're able to... to go and play,
and not worry about other things, distractions...
But, we'll see.
Coach Mendoza, he knows what it takes to change lives,
translation.es: El entrenador Mendoza sabe lo que se necesita para cambiar vidas

translation.en: using basketball as a catalyst with education.
translation.es: a través del básquetbol y la educación.

translation.en: There's many student athletes he's coached
that have received college scholarships,
that are off doing bigger and better things in the world.
translation.es: y ahora les va mejor en la vida.

translation.en: Before I came here, they had ten coaches in... in eight years.
translation.es: Antes de mí, pasaron diez entrenadores en ocho años.

translation.en: So, if Chinle will keep me here,
I would love to stay here and coach for... for a long time.
translation.es: me encantaría quedarme y entrenar durante mucho tiempo.

translation.en: But that's not a... a given.
Hey, if we... if we play well, everything will fall in place.
translation.es: Si jugamos bien, todo se acomodará.

translation.en: If we don't play well, then...
we don't get it done.
Okay.
Meal check for tomorrow...
Okay, good.
- Plus car. - Thank you.
The kids will love to know that we've got meals.
translation.es: A los niños les encantará saber que tenemos comida.

translation.en: - All right. All right, Coach. - Thank you.
Okay, on the baseline.
Hustle.
Okay, listen.
Now, tomorrow... first game of the year.
translation.es: Mañana es el primer partido del año.

translation.en: You have to know what you're doing.
The biggest thing you've got to remember,
if we can take care of the ball,
translation.es: es que si podemos cuidar el balón,

translation.en: if everybody can do that as a group, we'll be tough to beat.
translation.es: si lo hacemos como equipo, será difícil vencernos.

translation.en: Our particular brand here in this area... we play rezball.
translation.es: Nuestra marca particular es que jugamos básquetbol de la reserva.

translation.en: Let's go. No dribble. No dribble. Go.
Just go hard, just go hard. Don't dribble.
Rezball is a unique style of basketball...
translation.es: El básquetbol de la reserva es un estilo particular.

translation.en: and suits our strengths.
Rezball's just like running and gunning,
just pushing the ball, pushing the ball,
getting the open shot, taking the shot, coming back down,
and doing the same thing over and over.
As Navajo people, were not very big in stature.
translation.es: Los navajos no somos muy altos.

translation.en: So, for us to be effective against some of these bigger teams,
translation.es: Así que, para enfrentarnos contra equipos grandes,

translation.en: we basically have to run them out of the gym.
Rezball to us is, like, really fun.
translation.es: El básquetbol de la reserva es divertido.

translation.en: So we just like to have fun with it and we love to push the ball.
translation.es: Nos gusta divertirnos. Pasar el balón.

translation.en: Our coach really doesn't like that kind of basketball,
translation.es: A nuestro entrenador no le gusta,

translation.en: and tells us to stay away from it.
Hold it, hold it, hold it. Now... Hold it.
You're just running around.
Make sure you know where you're supposed to go.
Do it again, do it again.
Rezball. You know...
I really don't understand it,
but that's... that's why I asked.
There's no... structure.
Not there, not there! We--
We're not being patient.
We're trying to take every... first shot that comes around. We don't want that.
translation.es: Intentan lanzar cada vez que pueden. No queremos eso.

translation.en: Calm down a little bit, you're trying to rush everything.
I love to run, as long as there's a structure.
translation.es: Me encanta correr mientras haya una estructura.

translation.en: And I always try to tell the kids, you know,
translation.es: Y siempre les digo a los chicos:

translation.en: You have to make the best decision.
Okay, hold it, hold it. Yeah. Again.
We're just bunching up, guys. That's not what we want.
translation.es: Están agrupados. No es lo que queremos.

translation.en: Let's do it again. I want to walk through it.
My job is to teach the kids how to play basketball,
translation.es: Mi trabajo es enseñarles a jugar básquetbol,

translation.en: and learn how to play, and be able to play the game as it should be played.
translation.es: que aprendan a jugar como corresponde.

translation.en: Recognize it. Move the ball.
There it is, right there.
There you go.
Coach has won championships.
So he has the experience to know,
or he knows what to do to get there.
translation.es: O sabe qué hacer para llegar.

translation.en: So that's how, we just follow him.
Defensively is probably the... the thing I'm concerned about.
translation.es: Lo que me preocupa es la defensa.

translation.en: If everybody plays good defense, then we'll...
I-- I guarantee you, it's almost a given that we can do well.
translation.es: les garantizo que nos irá bien.

translation.en: Be patient. That's gonna be the difference.
Now, tomorrow, everybody wear slacks,
translation.es: Mañana quiero que usen pantalón de vestir,

translation.en: a dress shirt, a tie...
and hopefully, you shave, okay?
If you... If you look good...
they're gonna say, Oh, man. These guys mean business.
translation.es: van a decir: Estos tipos no bromean.

translation.en: Okay? Here we go. Break!
One, two, three, Wildcats!
You wanna shoot for a few minutes, that's okay.
Get your jerseys over here so we can put them in the wash.
translation.es: Dejen las camisetas para llevarlas a lavar.

translation.en: Coach, I don't have to shave, right? Am I good?
translation.es: No tengo que rasurarme, ¿no? Estoy bien.

translation.en: Get the laundry.
This year is a... a special group of kids.
translation.es: Este es un grupo especial de chicos.

translation.en: Because of my background, I'm able to relate them.
translation.es: Por mi experiencia, me identifico con ellos.

translation.en: I can understand them.
Home wasn't a pleasant situation for me.
translation.es: Mi hogar no fue un lugar feliz para mí.

translation.en: I know there's a detergent somewhere, but I don't know where it is.
translation.es: Sé que hay detergente, pero no sé dónde está.

translation.en: My mom and my dad divorced when I was a year old.
translation.es: Mis padres se divorciaron cuando yo tenía un año.

translation.en: So I never saw my dad.
I met him when I was about 13 years old.
translation.es: Me reencontré con él a los 13.

translation.en: He said, Hi, and I said, Hi, that was it.
translation.es: Nos saludamos, y eso fue todo.

translation.en: And then he told me that he was an alcoholic,
translation.es: Luego me dijo que era alcohólico,

translation.en: and, uh... within a year, he passed on.
I became personally responsible for my half- brothers and sisters.
translation.es: Me hice responsable de mis medio hermanos y hermanas.

translation.en: At the time, I had to haul water, chop wood...
translation.es: Debía ir a buscar agua, cortar madera...

translation.en: did everything a man had to do, because there was no man in the house.
translation.es: Hacía las tareas de un hombre, no había otro en la casa.

translation.en: I was the... I was the man.
It was hard, but I had no choice.
translation.es: Era duro, pero no tenía elección.

translation.en: For me, it was a matter of survival.
Opening up against Snowflake... It's always... That's a tough game.
translation.es: Iniciar contra Snowflake... Es un juego difícil.

translation.en: It's always a tough game.
And just to open up against them is pretty challenging.
translation.es: Y abrir contra ellos es un reto.

translation.en: Our team... kind of grew up together.
We always dreamed of winning State.
translation.es: Nuestro sueños es ganar el campeonato estatal.

translation.en: Uh, this is our year where we could probably make school history,
translation.es: Este es nuestro año, quizá logremos hacer historia.

translation.en: 'cause Chinle has never won a state championship before.
translation.es: Chinle nunca ha ganado un campeonato estatal.

translation.en: So, that would be nice for us to be the first ones to win State.
translation.es: Sería bueno que fuéramos los primeros en ganarlo.

translation.en: And it would be a big goal for us, be a big dream.
translation.es: Y sería un gran objetivo, un gran sueño.

translation.en: And I would love that very much.
Just probably be a good memory to look back on when we get older. You know?
translation.es: Sería un buen recuerdo para cuando seamos mayores. ¿Sabes?

translation.en: Around here on the reservation,
you can't find a good paying job without a degree anymore.
translation.es: no encuentras un buen trabajo si no tienes título.

translation.en: The only way for me to get into college right now
translation.es: La única forma de ir a la universidad

translation.en: is through an athletic scholarship.
It's really stressful, but...
whenever I want to give up,
I just think about my family.
As a son, I...
I love him.
Every day, in and out, we hug each other.
And he's my big baby.
All three of my kids.
Since he was small, he was always active.
translation.es: Siempre fue muy activo, desde pequeño.

translation.en: He went and did a lot of sports.
I saved all his bibs.
Some of them I put away.
And then, these are all...
all his medals...
here, and... and it is heavy.
Some coaches...
tell him that he's too short,
but then he determines.
He says, I'll prove you wrong.
translation.es: Dice: Les demostraré que se equivocan.

translation.en: And he does.
I'm so proud of my son.
I've always been... counted out or something
translation.es: Siempre me han dejado de lado

translation.en: just because of my height.
But, you know, that doesn't bother me.
When I'm playing, it feels like I'm just as tall as everyone else.
translation.es: Cuando juego, me siento tan alto como los demás.

translation.en: You know, I think that strength comes from...
my struggles that I went through as a... as a kid.
translation.es: de todas las dificultades de niño.

translation.en: I have a lot of good memories with my dad.
translation.es: Tengo muchos buenos recuerdos con mi papá.

translation.en: Kids always think their dads are the best man in the world.
translation.es: Uno siempre cree que su papá es el mejor del mundo.

translation.en: You know, we'd always go to the beach and stuff like that.
One of the funniest things actually was
translation.es: Una de las cosas más divertidas

translation.en: when we went to Washington DC,
translation.es: fue cuando fuimos a Washington D. C.

translation.en: I think we dressed for summer, but it was snowing over there.
translation.es: Llevamos ropa de verano, pero estaba nevando.

translation.en: We ended up just buying jackets, because it was so cold.
translation.es: Terminamos comprando abrigos por el frío.

translation.en: When we relocated here, it actually took a lot out of us.
translation.es: Cuando nos mudamos aquí, nos afectó mucho.

translation.en: My dad used to actually kind of treat my mom bad sometimes.
translation.es: A veces, mi papá trataba mal a mi mamá.

translation.en: I would see him intoxicated a lot.
Dad left us.
And, you know, I didn't want to believe it.
I'm like, How could he leave us? How could he do this to us? You know?
That's when things started going downhill for us.
translation.es: Ahí fue cuando nos empezó a ir mal.

translation.en: We had no running water, we had no electricity.
translation.es: No teníamos agua corriente ni electricidad.

translation.en: Sometimes, we would have to go to my relatives' to shower.
translation.es: A veces, íbamos a la casa de familiares a bañarnos.

translation.en: But, you know, my mom, she worked really hard,
translation.es: Pero mi mamá se esforzaba mucho.

translation.en: she got a job, and now, she got us running water,
translation.es: Consiguió trabajo. Gracias a ella, tenemos agua corriente, electricidad.

translation.en: she got us electricity, you know?
translation.es: Gracias a ella, tenemos agua corriente, electricidad.

translation.en: She puts food on the table for us.
She does all this for me, and that's why I do what I do,
translation.es: Ella hace todo esto por mí, y por eso hago lo que hago.

translation.en: because I want to get a... get a scholarship to go to college
translation.es: Porque quiero una beca para ir a la universidad

translation.en: and, uh, you know, get a good paying job, so I can take care of her
translation.es: y conseguir un buen trabajo, así puedo cuidarla

translation.en: the way she took care of me.
translation.es: como ella me cuidó a mí.

translation.en: I'm happy...
and my kids motivate me to keep going every day.
translation.es: Mis hijos me motivan a seguir todos los días.

translation.en: This is my sister, Tia.
She's gonna be taller than me, 'cause, you know, she had a different dad.
translation.es: Será más alta que yo, porque tiene otro papá.

translation.en: I'm going to make sure she becomes a good person
translation.es: Me aseguraré de que sea una buena persona,

translation.en: you know, be the best person that she can be.
translation.es: de que sea lo mejor que pueda ser.

translation.en: But, definitely, I'm gonna make sure that she's a better person than me.
translation.es: Pero, definitivamente, me aseguraré de que sea mejor que yo.

translation.en: I want to be like my brother.
He makes me happy.
When Mom's gone, he hugs me...
translation.es: Cuando mamá no está, me abraza

translation.en: so I can be safe, and...
- It's okay. -
So... I want to be just like my brother.
Okay. I think she's done talking now.
translation.es: Creo que ya terminó de hablar.

translation.en: It doesn't really matter where you come from, or...
what kind of struggles you had.
It's just how much you can take and keep moving forward.
translation.es: Lo importante es que aprendas y sigas avanzando.

translation.en: Yeah, I shed my tears here and there.
I just keep going, just to always think of my family.
You're a sophomore, you're a senior.
translation.es: DÍA DEL PARTIDO 9 HORAS PARA SNOWFLAKE

translation.en: We're ready for our picture.
All right, guys.
Our families can have warriors.
Obviously, our tribe has warriors.
And here, our basketball team
serves as our school and community warriors.
translation.es: son los guerreros comunitarios de la escuela.

translation.en: One serious. Okay, a serious one.
These young men go out and represent our people on the basketball court
translation.es: Estos jóvenes representan a la comunidad en la cancha de básquetbol

translation.en: all over the state of Arizona.
translation.es: en todo el estado de Arizona.

translation.en: Do your crazy pose.
Some of these kids don't have parental figures around.
translation.es: Algunos de los chicos no tienen padres presentes.

translation.en: The family that they create within themselves on the team,
translation.es: La familia que crean en el equipo

translation.en: it's literally a second family that our kids are creating.
translation.es: es una segunda familia para ellos.

translation.en: That's exciting to me.
You look like Zion now.
We won't get your muscles all in the frame.
This team that we have, they're a young team, but they're very talented.
translation.es: Los chicos del equipo son muy jóvenes, pero muy talentosos.

translation.en: All right, Cooper, we need a basketball move now.
translation.es: Cooper, queremos un movimiento de básquetbol.

translation.en: You ready?
I always believed that you want your captains
to have character... uh, integrity, you know,
things, like... that make them different from everybody else.
translation.es: Algo que los diferencie de los demás.

translation.en: And Cooper is a... I think he's a special young man.
Hey! Watch your ankle. Watch your ankle.
So, I say, Hey, I want you to be one of the captains. Is that okay with you?
translation.es: Le dije: Quiero que seas un capitán. ¿Te parece bien?.

translation.en: And he said he'd accept the challenge.
translation.es: Y dijo que aceptaría el desafío.

translation.en: You ready? Three, two, one... Nice.
And for him, as a sophomore,
translation.es: Y él, como estudiante de segundo año,

translation.en: he's not afraid to take that role and accept it.
translation.es: no tuvo miedo de aceptar la función.

translation.en: And I told him, I said, You know,
we're gonna go as far as you take us.
For being a captain is that role to lead everyone and be an example.
translation.es: Como capitán, eres líder y ejemplo de todos.

translation.en: It's an honor, you know.
I feel that... a lot of pride from that.
And I use it to, like, push myself, keep that fire in me going,
translation.es: Lo uso para alentarme, para conservar viva la llama.

translation.en: to light up the fire in everyone.
translation.es: Para conservar la llama de todos.

translation.en: Cooper Burbank, with the drive.
And the lay- in is good!
What a move by Cooper Burbank!
There's very few players that have come through
with natural talents, like Cooper.
Beautifully delivered! Wow!
He might be our first Division 1 player out of Chinle.
translation.es: Podría ser el primer jugador de División 1 de Chinle.

translation.en: Pull up shot. Burbank trains to three.
He's one of those kids that you'll probably see every ten years as a coach,
translation.es: Es uno de esos chicos que ves cada diez años como entrenador,

translation.en: or maybe not at all, you know.
And I think that, by the time he's done here,
translation.es: Y creo que, para cuando termine,

translation.en: he's gonna be the GOAT of Chinle.
translation.es: será el mejor en la historia de Chinle.

translation.en: You know, he has that potential.
Many people tell me stuff.
Good and bad, you know.
I'm always taught to stay humble, you know.
translation.es: Siempre me dicen que sea humilde.

translation.en: Just, like, be a sponge, you know, and just take it in and get better, keep getting better.
translation.es: Que absorba todo, que mejore continuamente.

translation.en: Aah, here's all the players I look up to.
translation.es: Estos son los jugadores que admiro.

translation.en: Each person has something that I watch or take from them.
translation.es: Cada uno tiene algo que quiero aprender.

translation.en: I admire Stephen Curry with his shooting.
translation.es: Admiro los lanzamientos de Stephen Curry.

translation.en: That's my favorite player, Kevin Durant, right there.
translation.es: Ese es mi jugador favorito, Kevin Durant.

translation.en: The thing I like about Kevin Durant is, like...
translation.es: Lo que me gusta de Kevin Durant

translation.en: he is a big man, and...
but he doesn't play like it, you know, he...
plays like a point guard, you know?
He can dribble and can shoot,
things that not even some point guards can do, you know?
translation.es: cosas que algunos base no saben hacer.

translation.en: He's doing it as... at the height of almost seven feet tall.
translation.es: Lo hace con casi 2,13 metros de altura.

translation.en: And that's what I would like to do, as well.
translation.es: Y eso es lo que me gustaría hacer.

translation.en: As tall as I am, I would like to handle and shoot
translation.es: Soy alto, y me gustaría saber controlar y lanzar,

translation.en: just like him.
I'd like one day for someone to have, like...
my name across their back or something,
translation.es: lleve mi nombre en la espalda,

translation.en: or even a poster of me.
Don't you have the roster?
The roster? I have a copy of it on one of the clipboards.
translation.es: ¿La lista? Tengo una copia en uno de los sujetapapeles.

translation.en: Look for the clipboard.
You organized this.
- Like the blind leading the blind. -
Right here.
Okay. See, I told you it was on a clipboard.
translation.es: Te dije que estaba en el sujetapapeles.

translation.en: That part, I was right.
Ah, this is an old one.
Well, tell the guys to come and get their jerseys.
translation.es: Diles a los chicos que vengan por las camisetas.

translation.en: - Okay. - That way we'll know
- what jerseys they have. - Okay.
translation.es: Así sabremos qué camisetas tienen. Bien.

translation.en: Nervous for the season.
People have so much expectation for us.
translation.es: La gente está expectante por nosotros.

translation.en: We don't want to let them down.
We don't wanna give Chinle a bad rep.
translation.es: No queremos hacer quedar mal a Chinle.

translation.en: It's not gonna fit.  So...
Even if I do roll it up a few, I don't think it will fit me.
translation.es: Aunque lo arremangue, no me quedará bien.

translation.en: Look at that. Look at that!
Our away games are pretty far.
We basically just sleep on our away games,
and getting home late at night at 12:00.
We have to go to school the next day.
It's kind of hard, but it's fun.
Hi, everyone, from Lobo Gymnasium in Snowflake, Arizona.
translation.es: Hola, desde el gimnasio Lobo, en Snowflake, Arizona.

translation.en: Welcome to Northland basketball.
A big one tonight to kick off things,
as two of the top teams in Arizona's 3A conference meet up.
translation.es: dos de los mejores equipos de la División 3A.

translation.en: That'll be us.
The pre- season rankings came out two days ago
translation.es: El ranking de pretemporada salió hace dos días,

translation.en: and Chinle starts off in the ninth spot.
translation.es: y Chinle está en el 9.o lugar.

translation.en: The Lobos of Snowflake, they're ranked number eight.
translation.es: Los Lobos de Snowflake están en el puesto ocho.

translation.en: And come February,
the top 24 teams in Arizona make the state playoffs.
translation.es: los 24 mejores de Arizona llegarán a las eliminatorias estatales.

translation.en: Raul Mendoza certainly wants to be in that group.
translation.es: Raul Mendoza quiere estar en ese grupo.

translation.en: We can be pretty good, you know, we've got everything.
translation.es: Podemos ser muy buenos. Tenemos todo.

translation.en: We've got the speed, we've got shooting, we've got rebounding.
So, we just need to put it all together  and make... and be one team.
translation.es: Debemos unir todo y ser un equipo.

translation.en: Yeah. A couple of things...
Don't take the first shot that's open.
Make sure that we... we take the shot that we can... that we want,
not what they give us.
Another thing, don't get in a hurry.
When they press us, we're not gonna get in a hurry,
translation.es: Cuando nos presionen, no nos apuraremos.

translation.en: we're gonna get it across the court and set up and run the offense.
translation.es: Vamos a llevar el balón al otro extremo y armaremos la defensa.

translation.en: If they're big, like I heard they are,
then it's gonna be hard for them to get up and down the court.
translation.es: les será difícil correr de un extremo a otro.

translation.en: We wanna go up and down the court, 'cause that's our strength.
translation.es: Iremos de un extremo a otro, es nuestra fortaleza.

translation.en: Josiah, he'll... he'll... he'll go. He's in shape.
translation.es: Josiah, él irá. Está en forma.

translation.en: He's not gonna get tired. He's just gonna run as hard as he can. Okay?
translation.es: No se va a cansar. Correrá tanto como pueda.

translation.en: You're from the Navajo reservation.
We're here representing Chinle.
Let's go, let's go!
A lot of people came from Chinle, and they're here.
- What up, Mo? - Yeah!
It's something that motivates you to play hard.
This is a chance for you guys to show what you can do as a team.
translation.es: Es su oportunidad de mostrar cómo son como equipo.

translation.en: This ought to be a great matchup tonight.
It's a contrast in style.
The Lobos are a big team, the Wildcats a little bit small, a little bit quicker.
translation.es: Los Lobos son grandes, los Wildcats son pequeños, pero más rápidos.

translation.en: A legend on the rez, Coach Raul Mendoza.
We'll get a first look at his team in action.
translation.es: Veremos a su equipo en acción.

translation.en: Hey, the stands are full with devoted Wildcat fans
translation.es: Está lleno de fanáticos de los Wildcats,

translation.en: and they're looking to start their season on the right foot, as they get set to tip it up.
translation.es: quienes están ansiosos por comenzar bien mientras se preparan.

translation.en: Behind you!
Snowflake controls the tip.
And they immediately blow past Josiah Tsosie for the easy lay- in.
translation.es: Supera a Josiah Tsosie y anota fácilmente.

translation.en: Come to the ball!
Josiah Tsosie turns the ball over
and Snowflake takes it up the floor.
Come on. It was a weak pass.
Gotta take the ball the other way.
translation.es: Lleven el balón al otro lado.

translation.en: Hey, let's get a good shot.
Let's go. Get a good shot.
Ball goes into the left corner.
translation.es: El balón va a la esquina izquierda.

translation.en: Cooper Burbank for three.
And the shot is good.
And the Wildcats are on the board.
Burbank again on the drive and...
Oh, a wild shot by Cooper.
Gotta shoot it, go far up there.
Time out.
We're just making mental mistakes.
You can't take shots like that.
If you don't have a shot, just dribble it out or pull up,
translation.es: Si no pueden, hagan drible o pásenlo por arriba.

translation.en: You know, throwing it up is not gonna help us a whole lot.
Josiah Tsosie hits Burbank with a very nice feed
translation.es: Josiah Tsosie le hace un buen pase a Burbank,

translation.en: and he finishes it off.
Josiah Tsosie in the corner. The three is up.
translation.es: Josiah Tsosie desde la esquina busca tres.

translation.en: The three is good.
It was a bumpy start, but Coach Mendoza got his team turned around,
translation.es: Fue un comienzo accidentado, pero Mendoza acomodó al equipo.

translation.en: and now they're in a nice groove.
The Wildcats have grabbed an 11- point lead here at the break.
translation.es: Los Wildcats llevan una ventaja de 11 puntos antes del descanso.

translation.en: Now... the thing that's killing us right now
translation.es: Escuchen, lo que nos juega en contra

translation.en: is that we're doing things we're not supposed to do.
translation.es: es que hacemos cosas que no debemos hacer.

translation.en: We missed lay- ups, we just tried to finger roll.
translation.es: Erramos bandejas por hacer finger roll.

translation.en: Don't get greedy and try to force it when it's not there.
translation.es: No intenten forzar algo que no sucederá.

translation.en: The idea is not how many shots we... we take,
it's how many good shots we take.
That's the difference between an average team, a mediocre team,
translation.es: Esa es la diferencia entre un equipo promedio, mediocre,

translation.en: and a good team.
The team that do the little things, that make the lay- up,
translation.es: El equipo que logra hacer bandejas,

translation.en: make the free throws, make the good passes...
That's gonna be the difference.
You know, right now, we're up,
- but we've got a whole half to go, guys. - Let's go.
Back to the action here at Snowflake High School early in the second half.
translation.es: Volvemos a la acción en Snowflake en la segunda mitad.

translation.en: It's been all Wildcats.
Cooper Burbank, the crossover... pull up...
translation.es: Cooper Burbank, el crossover, lanza por arriba...

translation.en: The shot is good.
- Wildcats' lead has grown to 18. -
We're up! We can go further, but we've gotta be smart.
translation.es: ¡Vamos ganando! Podemos más, pero con inteligencia.

translation.en: Hey, don't beat ourselves. Let's go.
Josiah Tsosie trapped, his pass, right to the Lobos,
translation.es: Josiah está atrapado, los Lobos interceptan el balón,

translation.en: they'll take it the other way and there's the lay- in.
translation.es: lo llevan para el otro lado y anotan.

translation.en: Be patient.
Josiah Tsosie drives, forces up the shot, gets off the mark.
translation.es: Josiah lanza, fuerza el tiro, no entra.

translation.en: Josiah!
And Snowflake has got the ball again.
Shoot us out of the game.
Go get him.
He just wants to shoot the ball.
Josiah!
Coach Mendoza has decided to give his point guard a rest.
translation.es: Mendoza decidió reemplazar a su base.

translation.en: He heads to the bench with eight points... but five turnovers.
translation.es: Va al banco con ocho puntos, pero cinco balones perdidos.

translation.en: Come on. You gotta get your head in the game.
Snowflake jump shot, eight.
translation.es: Snowflake y su tiro en suspensión.

translation.en: Snowflake might have a pulse here.
They score a couple of quick buckets, give their fans some hope.
translation.es: Anotaron unos puntos rápidos, y le dan esperanza al público.

translation.en: We can't let 'em get back in the game.
We have to be disciplined.
Play better defense. Okay?
Lobos on the drive, the dish,
Cooper steals the pass.
It's knocked away...
and it might have gone off Cooper's legs.
translation.es: Parece que tocó la pierna de Cooper.

translation.en: And it's Snowflake's basketball.
- Cooper! -
- He's just not there. - Yeah.
Stay in the game! Don't... Don't space out!
translation.es: Manténganse en el juego. No se distraigan.

translation.en: - Hey, focus on what you're doing. -
The Wildcats' lead is dwindling.
translation.es: La ventaja de los Wildcats disminuye.

translation.en: The Lobos are not gonna go away quietly.
translation.es: Los Lobos no se irán en silencio.

translation.en: They keep hanging around out there.
Listen, keep playing!
Don't give up!
You gotta want it more than they do!
And the game is tied, 69- 69.
translation.es: Y el juego está empatado 69 a 69.

translation.en: Unbelievable.
The Snowflake Lobos have battled all the way back from 18 down to knotted up.
translation.es: Los Lobos de Snowflake se esforzaron por llegar de 18 a un empate.

translation.en: The Wildcats need somebody, anybody to step up on offense.
translation.es: Los Wildcats necesitan a alguien en ataque.

translation.en: - Time out. -
Now, listen. This is what we're doing.
Cooper, you're right here.
You're gonna act ike you're gonna set the pick,
translation.es: Harás como si fueras a bloquear,

translation.en: and just go, okay?
And then Josiah, you're here.
Okay? One of you guys are gonna get it.
So, with the game on the line,
it looks like Josiah Tsosie is coming back in.
One, two, three, WIldcats!
Snowflake with pressure defense,
Chance Harvey brings it up the left side and up from there.
Back to the top, Josiah Tsosie has it.
And a pass nearly stolen by the Lobos.
translation.es: Y un pase que casi roban los Lobos.

translation.en: But Burbank picks it up, saves it for the Wildcats.
translation.es: Pero Burbank lo recibe, lo salva para los Wildcats.

translation.en: Sixty- nine, sixty- nine.
Dewayne Tom on the right angle. Nothing there for him.
translation.es: Dewayne Tom en el ángulo derecho. No hay nada.

translation.en: Passes it up, swing it around left side.
translation.es: Lo pasa, lo gira por la izquierda.

translation.en: Seconds to play.
Cooper Burbank from the corner, a three up and good!
translation.es: ¡Burbank, de la esquina, logra tres puntos!

translation.en: The Wildcats have made the shot,
and Chinle is gonna come away with a victory at Snowflake, 72 to 69,
translation.es: Chinle le gana a Snowflake 72 a 69.

translation.en: to begin their brand- new season.
Okay, we've gotta look at this tonight as something to learn from.
translation.es: Debemos ver esta noche como una lección.

translation.en: Good to win, but again, look at how we played.
translation.es: Es bueno ganar, pero veamos cómo jugamos.

translation.en: All those mental mistakes... We can't have it.
translation.es: Todos esos errores mentales no pueden suceder.

translation.en: We could have beat them by 15 or more, easily.
translation.es: Podríamos haberles ganado por 15 puntos o más.

translation.en: But we seem like we...
When we got ahead, some of you guys relaxed. You can't do that.
translation.es: Cuando logramos la ventaja, algunos se relajaron. No es así.

translation.en: You gotta keep playing through the whole thing.
translation.es: Debes seguir jugando hasta el final.

translation.en: Otherwise, you know, it was a win...
but this is something you... In order to beat a tough team,
you've gotta be mentally tough too.
I thought mentally, we lost in the second half.
translation.es: La mente la perdimos en la segunda mitad.

translation.en: We weren't there mentally, and that was the biggest thing.
translation.es: No estábamos ahí mentalmente, ese fue el problema.

translation.en: That's just something you've gotta learn.
Look at yourself in the mirror and say,
What did I do that I need to correct?
All of us can go down and say, What did I do that I need to correct?
translation.es: Todos podemos decir: ¿Qué hice que debo corregir?.

translation.en: And that's how you become better as individuals.
And as a team, we're gonna get better as we go.
translation.es: Como equipo, mejoraremos a medida que avancemos.

translation.en: Okay?
Break. Go.
- Wildcats on three. - One, two, three. Wildcats!
translation.es: - Wildcats a las tres. - Uno, dos, tres. ¡Wildcats!

translation.en: Put your jerseys in one area so we can pick them up.
translation.es: Acomoden las camisetas así las recogemos.

translation.en: As a head coach, I've seen kids that are very... talented,
translation.es: Como entrenador jefe, he visto chicos muy talentosos,

translation.en: very good players,
but didn't even get a chance to go to state playoffs.
translation.es: pero no lograron ir a las eliminatorias estatales.

translation.en: My man, 27 points, Coop!
Damn, Coop.
Good shot, Coop.
I always try to get the kids to understand
that getting into the playoffs is a special thing.
translation.es: que llegar a las eliminatorias es importante.

translation.en: A lot of it is the mental thing.
Everything has to fall in place to win the state championship.
translation.es: Todo debe salir bien para ganar el campeonato estatal.

translation.en: You know, this team that we have, we have a group of seniors.
translation.es: Hay chicos de último año en el equipo.

translation.en: We're gonna lose 'em next year.
translation.es: Ya no estarán el próximo año.

translation.en: You know, our guys have to learn to realize the urgency, I guess you could say.
translation.es: Los chicos deben entender la urgencia.

translation.en: We have the capability of winning the whole thing.
Why not go for it now?
It's your time to accomplish the impossible,
translation.es: Es hora de lograr lo imposible,

translation.en: which is something that we've never done here in Chinle, win a state championship.
translation.es: algo que nunca logramos en Chinle, ganar un campeonato estatal.

translation.en: So I'm hoping that the kids are starting to begin to understand
translation.es: Así que espero que los chicos empiecen a entender

translation.en: that this... this is it.
This is the time to do it.
This is the year.
